# ByteBashers Labs

We build high-impact software for teams that need to move fast without breaking trust.

[![Website](https://img.shields.io/badge/website-bytebashers.com-5ed7ff?style=for-the-badge)](https://bytebashers.com)
[![GitHub Org](https://img.shields.io/badge/github-ByteBashersLabs-111827?style=for-the-badge&logo=github)](https://github.com/ByteBashersLabs)

## What We Build
- Web platforms for operations and product teams
- Mobile apps with production-grade release workflows
- System modernization for legacy-to-modern transitions
- Embedded product engineering for shipping velocity

## Featured Build
### COR Training Systems (Coming Soon)
We are actively building a mobile-first training platform for **COR Powerlifting**.

Tech stack:
- Expo
- React Native
- Supabase

Live brand site: [teamcor.ca](https://teamcor.ca/)

## How We Work
1. Discover: define constraints, outcomes, and architecture decisions early.
2. Ship: iterate quickly with high standards for quality and reliability.
3. Scale: harden systems, improve observability, and support team handoff.

## Repositories
- `bytebashers` - company website and brand experience
- `cor-training-systems` - COR app build (private until release)

## Connect
- Website: [bytebashers.com](https://bytebashers.com)
- GitHub: [github.com/ByteBashersLabs](https://github.com/ByteBashersLabs)
- Contact: open an issue in the appropriate repo or use the website contact form

> Building software that holds up in production.
